attributes.action: Immediately call a General Election a vote of no confidence in the current government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current government are sitting and watching the UK fall apart due to high taxes, rising inflation and uncontrooled immigration. Action needs to be taken now to save the nation from ruin and this government are just not up to task

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
